Name: Glittermitten Grove
About the game: Ahoy, a-hey, o loddi-doddi day, fair traveller and welcome to Glittermitten Grove! Here you will find a land of enchantment, whimsy, and resource management. Sow the fields with magic seeds, pick berries from the plentiful boughs of our sugar fern trees, and collect sparkles from the resplendent rays of our sun-kissed thicket to help us prepare for the long winter ahead. Come join us in our faerieland, full of strange adventure! Features: Sow the fields with special seeds Pick berries for your winter needs Collect sparkles to light up the night Light fribblesham fireworks for happy delight
